walletConnect.title: Algorand WalletConnect
walletConnect.description: Use WalletConnect to link your Algorand wallet to AlgoMart.
walletConnect.helpText: Need a wallet? Get one here:
walletConnect.orCancel: or cancel and disconnect from wallet

fineprint.label: Secondary Marketplace fineprint
fineprint.helpText: Secondary market transaction fineprint. Hell of velit tempor ipsum knausgaard, craft beer cliche activated charcoal gentrify anim adaptogen incididunt vice kitsch heirloom. Cloud bread intelligentsia ugh etsy irony, normcore nostrud quinoa skateboard jianbing bushwick air plant live-edge hashtag.
fineprint.linkText: Read more about secondary market purchase policies here.

sell.title: List for sale
sell.body: List your NFT for sale on our secondary market, get paid in ALGO. Listings can be removed at any time.
sell.learnMore: Learn more about selling NFTs on Algomart

transfer.title: Transfer to wallet
transfer.body: Transfer your NFT to an external Algorand wallet. NFTs transferred to an external wallet will no longer appear in your collection.

cannotTransfer.frozen: This NFT is frozen and cannot be transferred.

exportStatus.optingIn: Please confirm the transactions in your wallet to opt-in to the NFT.
exportStatus.signTransaction: Please confirm the transactions in your wallet to transfer the NFT.

checkoutStatus.optingIn: Please confirm the transaction in your wallet to send funds to the seller.
checkoutStatus.purchased: Transaction successful! Transferring NFT to your wallet...
checkoutStatus.success: Success! The transaction is complete and the NFT has been transferred.
checkoutStatus.error: Error with transaction. Please try again.
